channel.title: Travel on Colin Sullender
channel.description: Recent content in Travel on Colin Sullender

item.title: Colorado Summer
item.description: I recently visited Estes Park, Colorado where my dad has moved/semi-retired and took a ton of pictures since it’s absolutely beautiful up there. Here are a select few with many more available on my Flickr account. Sadly there was almost no snow in the park, which is apparently very unusual (thanks a lot global warming). Hopefully I’ll be able to visit again around Christmas so there should be plenty of that annoying white precipitation on the ground.
